resources.string: There is not enough free space on your SD card to save the attachment. Please delete some files and try again.
There is not enough free space in your phone storage to save the attachment. Please delete some files and try again.
Your phone is not authorized to open attached Android applications. Please contact your service provider for more information.
You can’t add that many attachments. Please select fewer than 100 items.
Some content has not yet been downloaded, and will not be included in your reply.
The file cannot be opened because it is corrupted.
The selected folder was removed from the server.
The account is being deleted, please wait...
Make this my default mail account
Changing the email address will delete the current account.
Changing the username will delete the current account.
Changing the server will delete the current account.
Changing the mail protocol will delete the current account.
The file is missing. Do you want to download it again?
Attachments are missing. Do you want to download them again?
You must add at least one recipient.
An Exchange ActiveSync account already exists. You can only have one Exchange ActiveSync account on the phone.
The account settings have been saved.
Incorrect mail address or password. Please try again.
Download mail when I open folder
Download message body when I scroll down
Remove messages from phone when deleted on server
Email error. Please enter the correct email address.
The account cannot be verified. Do you still want to save the account settings?
The account name or password is invalid
Warning: The account name already exists.
An account with this email address already exists.
already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?

Attachments are inaccessible because SD card is missing or mounted to a PC. Reinstall SD card or disconnect USB cable to access files on the SD card.
The file size is too large
Some attachments are missing. Would you like to continue?
The file is missing. Would you like to remove it?
No accounts exist. Please add an account.
"Mail was saved successfully, but some attachments are unavailable. Make sure USB cable is disconnected and SD card is installed."
Some of the attachments have not been downloaded yet. These will not be attached to the forwarded mail.
Some content has not yet been downloaded, and will not be included in your forwarded message.
The phone is out of memory. Please try again later.
Mail messages in this folder will be deleted.
SD card is currently set to read only.
The email address already exists. Do you still want to continue?
The email is no longer available on the server.

Disconnect the phone from the computer to access files on the SD card.
SD card is currently set to read only.
There is not enough free memory to download this attachment.
There is not enough free memory to download this mail.
The message is too large to download.
The file size is too large.
Unable to open this type of file.
There are problems with the security certificate for this site.
This certificate is not from a trusted authority.
The name of the site does not match the name on the certificate.
This certificate is not valid yet.
"There is not enough free space. Please delete some messages and try again."
"Your incoming server does not support SSL. Please modify your incoming server's security type."
Cannot connect to the mail server
Cannot connect to the remote server. Please check the network settings and then try again.
You need a network connection to use this application. Please turn on mobile network or Wi-Fi in Settings.
"Your incoming server does not support TLS. Please verify your incoming server's security type."
"Your incoming server does not support APOP. Please verify your incoming server's protocol type."
"Your outgoing server does not support SSL. Please modify your outgoing server's security type."
"Your outgoing server does not support authentication. Please verify your outgoing server settings."
"Your outgoing server does not support TLS. Please verify your outgoing server's security type."
The email address is not valid. Please verify your email address.
The port number is not valid. Please verify your port number.
Network unavailable. Message saved to Outbox.
The contact list is being prepared. Please wait...
The recipients are being added, please wait...
The email address is not valid.
is not a valid email addres. Do you want to send it anyway?
Do you want to remove the recipient?
Files that are protected by DRM cannot be attached.
Do you want to save this email as a draft?
Are you sure you want to discard this message?
The email was not sent. Do you want to save the email as a draft?
Phone storage is full. Please delete some files and try again.
This mail is still on the server
This mail is not on the server
to verify your account information. Your server is not responding.
Email cannot be opened while it is sending.
Mail messages cannot be opened while they are being saved
Your email, calendar, and contact data will be synchronized. This may result in additional data usage.
Select the data to synchronize with the Exchange Server
To change Mail and Calendar synchronization options after setup, press \"HOME > Menu\", and then select \"Settings > Data synchronization > Exchange ActiveSync > MENU > Settings\".
An authentication error has occurred on the server.
Unauthorized user. Please verify username and/or password.
Source URI not found on the server.
The server is busy. Another sync may be in progress.
Failed to connect to the server.
Unable to connect to the server.
Error parsing the file from the server.
An integer column does not contain an integer.
Failed to get synckey from the Exchange Server.
Error occurred on the computer running the Exchange Server.
Synchronization key does not match or is not valid.
A data conflict occurred between the phone and the server.
The Exchange Server returned some status errors.
Source and destination collection IDs are identical.
An error occurred during the Move Item operation.
An item with that name already exists at the destination.
Source or destination item is locked.
Failed to get server protocol version.
There were some socket errors while connecting to the server.
Mail storage full on the Exchange server.
Unable to sync due to security policy
Refresh content when I open Mail and Calendar
This server requires an encrypted SSL connection
Always-on mobile data is currently disabled. Your phone will only check for mail periodically while the screen is off. Tap Settings to enable always-on mobile data.
Failed to connect to the Exchange server. Please check Exchange server settings.
Cannot connect to the Exchange server.
Authentication failed. Please verify username and/or password.
Unable to connect to your Exchange server. Please check your internet connection and verify your account settings. For further assistance, contact your Exchange Server Administrator.
Remove failed. Cannot delete the server while synchronization is in progress.
The fields marked in red contain errors.
Failed to create the account. Please try again later.
Sync cannot be performed in airplane mode.
Disabled by Exchange policy. Contact IT administrator for details.
All Exchange mail, calendar events, and contacts will be removed. Do you want to continue?
Out of memory. Please try again later.
Attachment size exceeds limits allowed by policy
The account for this widget has been deleted. Would you like to switch to another account?
User authorization failed. Please correct your Exchange Server credentials.
Your Exchange server requires that you enable security policies to continue synchronizing. Would you like to continue?
Your search did not return any results. Please edit your search terms and try again.
The server does not support this feature
Automatically reply once to each sender with this message:
Enter your auto reply message here
Unable to get your Out of office settings from the Exchange server right now. Please try again later.
Unable to save the settings to your Exchange server right now. Please try again later.
Send auto reply message to external recipient

A 139 account already exists. You can only have one 139 account on the phone.
Do you want to delete the existing account and create a new one?
Please wait...this could take about three minutes
You have already set up this Exchange account
You may only have up to 15 Exchange accounts on your phone.
Your IT administrator requires that you activate these security policies in order to sync with your Exchange Server.
Your Exchange ActiveSync account will be removed if you disable this administrator.
You need to install an SD card to unzip this attachment. Please insert a card and try again.
"You don't have enough free space remaining in your phone's storage.Please delete some content or applications to make at least %dKB free space.Tap \"Settings\" below to manage your apps."

Save battery power and use less data

Please contact your IT team for assistance
Exchange server require you to use credential storage, please set a password for credential storage.
Enabling encryption will erase any data on your SD card. Non-encrypted cards will be mounted read-only. Press OK to enable encryption.
External storage is full or unavailable, would you want to save to internal storage?
Unable to send or receive new messages
Sync is currently experiencing problems. It will be back shortly.
"Do you really want to delete this account? Deleting it will also delete all of its messages, contacts, and other data from the phone. Proceed?"

This account is required by some applications. You can only remove it by resetting the phone to factory defaults (which deletes all of your personal data). You do that in Settings, under SD & phone storage.

For security reasons, adding a new account will remove existing email accounts on this phone.
We found existing email accounts. Restore them by tapping on any account or tap Add New.
